1.content:
You come home from school. It's an average day--nothing out of the ordinary. After finishing your homework, you sit around watching TV. None of your friends are coming over and there's nothing good on TV. You're bored to death. Suddenly, an idea comes to your head. Why don't you explore the basement. You haven't been down there in years and it would put a little adventure in your life.

Carefully, you make your way down the creaky, old steps. After observing the room you're in something catches your eye. A futuristic machine sits at the corner of the room. Not knowing what to expect, you flip the switch on. The machine whirs to life and a strange light engulfs you. After 30 seconds, the light fades. Nothings happened as far as you can see. You're still the same...
1.title: Strange Light

11.content:
You decide to go to bed. You feel tired and a little confused. You lay back on your bed and allow the pillow to form to your head and the soft sheets to melt over your body. It's a warm night and you think it'll be hot tomorrow.
--//--
You wake up. Your eyes are a little blurry.
"MIKE! MICHAEL!" A huge booming voice yells. You aren't on your bed anymore. Your on a huge; no, wait. This is your bed! You're just smaller, a lot smaller! You try to run and slide down the sheets that you half pushed off the side of your bed onto the floor. You're only half an inch tall!
Your bedroom door now swings open to someone wearing board-shorts and applying sunscreen. It's:
11.title: 1 - 2 - 3 - Wake up!

111.content: Your huge buff father comes in to check on you. He walks over and sits down on your bed practically slamming his thigh into you. Are you able to get his attention when you pinch his leg?
111.title: Your Lifeguard Father Chris

choices: Grab a hold of his flip-flop
113.content:
Tony is your 18-year-old brother (you're only 14). He's 6'5'' and has an athletic build. You guys have never been the best of friends and often get into fights. Your father is on a business trip and sadly your brother is babysitting you.

Right now he stands in the doorway, mighty as a titan to your insignificant stature. "MICHAEL, WHERE ARE YOU?? WE'RE GOING TO THE BEACH, REMEMBER?" Tony stands at the doorway for a few minutes. Make your choice now. Should you...
113.title: Tony the Titan

1131.content: Quickly, before he moves away, you grab ahold of his giant flip-flop. Right after you grab on, he turns away to walk downstairs. He sits on the livingroom couch and flips on the T.V. You're stunned when you see that its already 11 in the morning. You gaze up at Tony's shirtless torso. After a couple minutes you hear snoring. What should you do next?
1131.title: A Giant Snore

choices: He takes you to the kitchen
11311.content: Slowly, you climb up your brother's leg. When you reach the top of his knee, things are a lot easier. You run up his thigh, making it to your brothers waistline. Again you take caution as you step foot on your brother's stomach. Suddenly, you here a growl from below you. He opens his eyes and groggily rubs his face. His eyes come to focus on you. "Michael, is that you?" His massive hand swoops down and scoops you up. "You're so tiny! How did you get..." Another rumble, louder this time, is emitted by Tony's belly. "I'm hungry. Let's go get lunch."
11311.title: A Short Nap

113111.content:
"On the other hand," an evil grin spreads across Tony's face.

"What?" you reply almost automatically.

"I could just have lunch here. Dad would never know." Tony's being very mysterious.

"What do you mean??!!" you're starting to get nervous.

"You know, we've been in fights for years. I could end your miserable life, and satisfy my hunger at the same time. I could swallow you whole."

You're mortified. "You wouldn't dare!!"

"But I would. I already am." Tony licks his licks hungrily. The growling of his stomach intensifies. "Listen to your new home," Tony coos as he presses you against his belly.

He lifts you up by your shirt collar and opens his mouth wide. "YOU'RE A PSYCO. DAD WILL FIND OUT WHAT YOU'VE DONE!!" you yell.

"Maybe I'll just have to eat him too," Tony replies.

You can't help it. You begin screaming uncontrollably as your brother drops you between his teeth. You're sloshed around in his mouth for a while. "Bye little bro. Sorry it had to end this way." Then, you here that horrible sound. *GULP*. You're wooshed away down the abyss of his esophogaus. The door to his stomach opens and you land with a plop in it.

A booming voice echos around the gigantic cavern. "YOU TASTED SOOO GOOD. BUT I'M STILL HUNGRY!!" Chewing noises are audible above your brother's stomach. Bits of hamburger meat rain from above. He was always a pig.

You pound on his stomach. All you get in response is a large belch. You continue struggling until you are taken over by his stomach acids.
113111.title: Early Lunch

1131111.content: As you hold your little brother in the palm of your hand, an awful idea dawns upon you. All you can think about is your hunger. Soon, you find that Michael's in your mouth. You swallow. He tastes sooo good. You realize you're still hungry. You quickly gobble up two burgers. After you finish, you gaze down at your shirtless belly. You can still see and feel your brother's thrashings within it. You rub your stomach. A belch passes between your lips and you re-taste your brother. The thrashings stop. You've just eaten your brother. Suddenly, there's a knock at the door. It's your...
1131111.title: The Devourer

11311111.content:
It was your dad...

What do you do?
11311111.title: Your Dad

12.content: Its late out, so you decide to go to sleep. Not thinking anything of the strange events that evening, you drift off to bed. But that was all to change...
12.title: Sleep

121.content: You wake up the next morning. You notice something is wrong before you open your eyes. Glancing around your bedroom you realize what it is. You shrank overnight to 1/2 an inch tall! Without having time to take any action you hear footsteps in the hall. It's your...
121.title: Shrank

1211.content:
"JENNA, YOU UP YET?" comes the voice of your brother, washing over you like a wave, and tossing you off your feet, which had been unsteady on the uneven terrain of your bed anyway. Opening your door slowly he looks around your room, his body shiny a bit with oil, already for a morning swim, which wasn't so unusual considering it was a weekend, and he and his friends often went swimming when the weather was nice like today.

"Down here!" you shout at him, waving your arms and trying to jump up and down, but failing. Not seeing you immediately he walks into your room farther, right up to your bed in fact, his trucks, smooth and dry for the moment, seeming like a wall in front of you. Never were you a very big girl, barely coming to his shoulder here lately in terms of height, but right now he looks like some kind of moving mountain as you stare up at him, and he tosses back your covers looking for you.

Suddenly you are knocked over as something falls on you, and you shake it off to find that you were attacked by the draw string of your big brother's trunks. Of course this presented you with a good opportunity to get out of your room, though at the same time, you wondered if that was really safe. It might be better to just wait in your room and see if this wears off on its own. Holding the draw string in your arms you have to decide quickly as you brother starts to sigh, and is about to turn and walk away.
1211.title: Wake Up Call From the Giant

12111.content:
Taking a firm hold on the string you nearly feel your arms tear out of their sockets as your brother moves away from the bed, you riding his shorts, and despairingly, you note that he doesn't even feel you as you swing on the strings. Luckily though he doesn't mistake you for a bug either as he walks back into the diningroom, where his friend Matt is sitting at the table, a plate in front of him, and two more places set up for your brother and father.

"SHE WASN'T IN HER ROOM. LOOKED LIKE SHE LEFT SOME TIME LAST NIGHT," notes your brother in that deep voice that shakes you to your core. For a moment you debate letting go and covering your ears if anyone else says anything, but luckily everyone is silent as he walks into the kitchen beyond the dining room, where your father is working on the electric grill at something you can't see.

He get's a look at whatever it is, and the growl of his belly above you tells you he's hungry as he suddenly turns away from it, and this causes the cord your gripping to go taunt, his spin fast enough to toss you off of him, hurtling through the air, the floor passing by as you sail right for the table, where a plate of pancakes is already set in the middle. Screaming you soar weightless for a moment over the center of the table, before gravity asserts itself, and you plummet right.....
12111.title: Free Flying Lessons

121111.content:
Your screams are cut short as you suddenly find yourself bouncing on the soft, fluffy surface of one of your dad's pancakes. He said he'd learned how to make them from your mother, and what little you remembered of her told you he had indeed done that, as her's were always golden and softer that a cloud, with a mouth watering taste to them that always made them vanish quickly into any nearby mouths.

With that thought in mind you decide to try and get off of the pancake, but find yourself unable to stand on the surface, and then discover crawling too is impossible, the depression you made too deep, with walls too slick with melted butter for you to get out of. So it is, that when your father comes in with the last load of pancakes you find yourself unable to do more than cry out and raise your arms as he covers you with them.

Held down by the light, yet firm weight of the pancakes you can't do much for the moment, and so decide to just wait it out, and try to ignore the sounds around you as utensils and hens scrap against plates, and chewing permeates the air. The swallowing is the worst though, that final, condemning sound, which may well be the last one you hear. It seems like days you sit there, but then, all at once, you are returned to the light and open air, only to roll around in your depression as the pancake you are on is put on the plate in front of.....
121111.title: Most Important Meal of the Day

choices: a knife to cut his breakfast into bite sized bits with.
the pancake, to push into his mouth whole.
1211111.content:
"Matt, wait, don't eat me!" you shout, trying to claw your way out of the depression, as suddenly your view is filled with the visage of that mighty titan. He was even bigger than your brother before, and you had thought that the difference would be less noticeable now with you size being this small, but somehow he just had that presence that made him feel huge, and you wanted to fall down and worship him for a moment.

That is, until his hand suddenly reached behind you, and you saw it pick up a massive bottle of syrup, that he then seemed to hold right over you. At first, he seemed to get nothing out of it, and you held onto the hope for a moment that maybe you had run out, but then, all at once, a stream of the sticky liquid poured forth from inside the bottle, oozing down around you and the pancake, pressing you under it's weight as it spread out, and literally making you afraid you might drown.

Luckily, you where able to swim just hard enough through the stuff to push your head up above it, your feet scrapping against the pancake only a little as the syrup filled the depression almost as deep as the pool out back, which all there of the shirtless titans around you, their bodies slick and shiny with sun block, were going to be swimming in after breakfast. Matt seemed to think you would be happier swimming in his stomach though as he reached down and picked up.....
1211111.title: Jenna, Part of Matt's Balanced Breakfast?

12111112.content:
Matt rolled up the pancake you're in. You're trapped in the middle. As he lifts the pancake you get a good glance at your brother, who seemed to have finished his meal. Matt, apparently, eats the most and has a second course of eggs and meats waiting to be devoured. Frightend at your unfortunate fate, you yell, hoping someone will hear you. Your efforts are not rewarded.

The ascent in the pancake, however, does provide you with a good view with the next, hopefully not last destination on your jorney. Matt's bare torso rumbles hungrily. You swear you can hear screams emitting from deep within his belly. You'll soon find out.

You've reached your first stop. Matt's mouth gapes open. You can see bits of breakfast among his teeth. You get one last glance outside. Then, his mouth closes, trapping you within a dark, humid cavern that smells of previous meals. Suddenly, your world tilts backward. In a sickening "gulp" your washed away on an adventure in Matt's tummy.
12111112.title: Pancake Jenna

121111121.content:
After some time, you land in a sickening goop. You thrash around.

Not being able to see, because of the absence of light, you could picture steam rising.

Bit by bit, you were digested.
121111121.title: You are digested

choices: You are trapped in Matt's stomach
121111122.content:
You scream as you make your way down Matt's esophagus, squeezed and pushed down the tight tube. There is enough milk and syrup for you to be able to swim, but you are disgusted by the warm mush covering you. The pancakes are melting quickly, though you notice nothing is happening tomyou... yet.

The chamber around you moves and gargles with eachhh movement Matt makes. You can't do anything but reflect on your life while you are trapped in this chamber. The true irony was that you and Matt had started dating a few months back. Matt had been upset that you and he hadn't had sex yet, and now you were trapped inside of him.

After three hours of beinng jostled around you come to the conclusion that you can't be digested. However, you are too large to fit through the entrance to his intestines. You are trapped in his stomach.
121111122.title: Trapped in a Tummy

choices: His draw string (It is pretty long)
12112.content: You decide to stay in your room, because it might be safer here. Just as you are you let go of the draw strings, your brother backs away from the bed. You scream as you miss the bed and start to plummet to the ground. Flailing your arms you try to grab something to stop you fall. With a sting of pain, you hit a surface and hold on to it. You let out a sigh of relief as the frightening fall stops. Looking around you realize that you are on your brothers
12112.title: Stay in you room

121121.content:
With each step your giant brother takes, you have to hold on tightly, so you don't fall off. You decide that it would be best to get somewhere safer. Looking down you see his giant flip flops crashing up and down. Too dangerous. "I guess I will have to go up," you say to yourself. Grabbing his leg hairs you start the climb. It is exhausting climbing something that is so much bigger than you. Normally you would afraid of climbing like this, without any harness for protection, but you seem to stick to your brother like a bug would. Once you get to his swim trunks, you stop to catch your breath. You turn to see where the giant is walking to. Everything is disoriented at your size, but you can tell that he is outside. That probably means he is going to the pool. You need to hurry and get his attention, before you are drowned.

Reaching for the leg of his swim trunks, you try and pull yourself onto of it, but you slip. Trying again, you get the same result. With a gulp, you decide that the only way you can make it is to go up the inside. You really don't want to see your brother naked parts, but you don't have a choice. Do you go up the front or back?
121121.title: Leg (Holding onto hair)

1212.content: Your dad, Chris, walks into your room. He's a lifeguard, but he should be a basketball player. At 7 feet, he's taller than anyone you've met. Now he's a titan. He's shirtless, dressed in his swim shorts. He has a tanned, niceley-toned body. "JENNA," he calls out. Apparently he's looking for you. He squats so that his belly-button is level with you. Seizing the chance, you jump into his navel. He gets back up apparently convinced you're not in your room. He walks over to...
1212.title: Searching

12121.content:
You ride cozily in your father's belly-button. Your comfort is interuptted by a loud growl. You realize your dad is hungry! Suddenly, you are catapulted out of your "hiding place" and land on a soft surface. You realize you're on a pancake. You get up and look to you're right. Chris is preparing for breakfast. You watch in horror as the food on the plate in front of him dissapears. He burps, contented, and pats his belly. You sigh, you're not gonna be eaten by your father.

Without warning, you feel a tugging motion. Looking up, you realize with fear that your father is going to eat the pancake after all.
12121.title: Navel Ride

choices: You make it through the day
122.content: You wake up and get dressed. It's Friday morning and the events that occured last night are forgotten. Quickly you get dressed, excited for the slumber party you have planned for that night. You catch the bus to school and make it just in time.
122.title: Going to School

choices: at his house in the palm of his hand
on the floor of his room looking up at him, David and Sam
1221.content:
You have just had the best day! Perhapse that machine was a good luck device! You got an A in English first up in the morning and then at lunch you found out that your friend Holly had just asked out Josh Thompson who she had talked about non stop since she sat next to him on her bus home last week.
Life in short was good but soon that was going to change. You sit down in Science behind Ethan Roberts. You have always wanted to go out with him but have always wanted him to ask you. Your thoughts are interrupted when Miss Forbes puts on a video about someone who went and lived with the apes.
You don't watch the video. Instead you stair at Ethan in front of you between two of his friends, Sam and David. He has a Rusty T-shirt on and a par of cargo pants. His big smooth feet are in a pair of havaiana flipflops with black souls and white straps. His hair has blond tips but is dark brown.
When the video stops you get your things together and walk out. You are followed by Casey. You walk around the corner to go to the lady's room when you hear her call out behind you.
"Hey Pervert! Look at me when I talk you fat bitch Jenna!"
You spin around.
"Casey? What have I done? How dare you call me fat! The Dr always wants me to put on more weight when I go!"
"Whatever Pervert! You keep your eyes of Ethan! He's going to be mine bitch!"
"Whatever Casey."
You go to spin around but she slaps you across the face.
"Go to hell Pervert!"
With that she storms off. You find tears streaming down your face. You sit against the wall and put your face in your hands and cry out the hurt. Just then who should come around the corner but Ethan.
"Hey Jen, what's up? I didn't see you in History so Mr Hawk said I could try to find you."
He sits down next to you.
"I'm sorry Ethan..."
"Call me Robbo if you like." he laughs "Ethan sounds like a serial killer's name"
You look at him and laugh.
"Well I don't think of you like that. I'm sorry Casey just got a bit mad at me for something I did and I feel so bad about it because I think she's right and..."
he cuts you off
"Calling you a Fat Bitch isn't ok Jen. I'm sorry I.. um.. well.. I didn't go to history. I came to ask you something and then I herd Casey yelling at you so I waited behind the lockers."
you laugh a little
"Coming to kill me were you?" your voice is showing the cheer he is bringing back into you.
"Well no. I was going to ask you if.. well.. Jenna, would you like to do something some time? I mean, go out?"
Your face must of lit up because he gives you a huge smile.
"Umm. Sure Ethan! I'd love it!"
He chuckles and begins to stand up. As he does you feel giddy and black out. When you wake up you are 1 inch tall and:
1221.title: Ethan

12211.content:
You slowly open your eyes and stand up. You have no idea where you are--until you look up to see a giant face hovering over you. You scream, when a voice speaks. "It's okay, I won't hurt you." You recognize the voice as Ethan's.

Looking up toward him, you ask, "what happened?" He explains how you were suddenly engulfed in a blue light and shrunk to a height of three inches. He snuck you through the school day in his bag and brought you home. He then proceeds to make you a small bed with an empty matchbox and small scraps of fabric. You thank him and he tells you to wait there, as he has some business to take care of.
12211.title: Giant Ethan

122112.content:
You begin to doze off in your little matchbox bed when you here shouts coming from below. You sit up in your bed, trying to make out what is being said. Suddenly, all goes quiet. You then hear someone coming up the stairs and see the door to Ethan's bedroom open. In walks Ethan's 18-year-old brother, Ryan. Ryan is a senior in high school and is on the swimming and baseball teams. Unlike Ethan, his hair is blonde. He stands 6'4'' and has a lean, but muscular body. Right now, he appears to be ready for a swim in the backyard pool, as all he has on are a pair of boardshorts and flip-flops.

Suddenly, Ryan yells, "where is she punk?" in the direction of his upturned palm. You think he's crazy until you realize that a shrunken Ethan is in his hand and that he's probably talking about you. Quickly, you hide in your matchbox bed.
122112.title: Big Brother

1221121.content:
Ryan glances your way just as you duck into your makeshift bed. Smirking, he reaches over and picks up your "bed." Tauntingly, he coos, "come out little Jenna. Come and say hi to your little boyfriend, Ethan." Reluctantly you climb out of the box and onto Ryan's palm, standing next to Ethan. The two of you give each other a quick, reassuring hug, which Ryan teases. Unfortunately, you've already had the pleasure of meeting Ryan because your older brother plays on the baseball team with him. In fact, he once asked you out last year when you were a freshman, but you rejected him, much to his disappointment. You do, however, in agreement with the rest of the girls at school, have to admit that Ryan is attractive, but you also find him to be immature and selfish. Although his brother is two years younger, not quite as muscular, and much shorter (5'9''), you'd pick him over Ryan any day.

Now having the two of you in his possession, Ryan explains that he shrunk you both with a shrinking gun he bought at a local pawn shop. When Ethan asked you out, Ryan was waiting around the corner to fire the gun at you. He meant to shrink the both of you, but missed Ethan. The struggle you heard downstairs was Ethan trying to escape from Ryan. Ryan then tells you what he plans to do with you...
1221121.title: Ryan Sees You

choices: He scoops you up in his palm and takes you downstairs
12211211.content: "I have plans for you two," Ryan begins. He's suddenly interrupted by a loud rumbling noise. You are confused for a moment--you can't tell where the sound is coming from. It is only as Ryan looks down at his sculpted six pack that you come to realize that the noise was the growling of his stomach. He's hungry. Ryan looks back at you and Ethan with an evil glint in his eye. "Then again, plans do change. You two wouldn't mind talking to me over lunch would you? Or should I say, in my lunch." He chuckles mirthlessly to himself. You and Ethan huddle in fear, clinging on to one another. His stomach growls again, louder this time. "Wouldn't wanna keep this waiting," Ryan says to you as he pats his tummy. Just then...
12211211.title: He's gonna eat you

122112111.content: Who is at the door?
122112111.title: The doorbell rings

1221121111.content:
Ryan licks his lips, and, tauntingly, lowers his open mouth towards you. You begin to cry as you hold Ethan closer.

*Ding dong*

"Uhhhh...." Ryan closes his jaws and starts walking towards the door. "Don't move an inch you two..." He opens the door, revealing someone you couldn't be happier to see.

"Casey!" You exclaim as you lift yourself up from the counter.

"Can I help you?" Ryan exasperates as he looks Casey with the deadest glare.

"Hey, I heard from her friends that my sister disappeared from school today. Is Ethan around? I wanted to ask if he's seen her." Ryan allowed a tiny drop of sweat to bead on his forehead.

"Uh, yeah, he's uh, out back...c'mon, I'll show you." Ryan lead as him and Casey walked into the house towards the kitchen.

"Casey! Please, help us! Down here, we're shrunk!" Casey thought he heard his name for a brief moment, but before he could instigate, he turned to see Ryan pointing the shrink ray at him.

"Wait!" Casey was shrunk by Ryan, who, laughing, picked him up off the ground and tossed him on to the counter. You run to Casey and hold him.

"Casey...are you alright?" You are relieved when he begins to breathe easier.

"Yeah...am I on the Mary Jane again sis?" You giggle a bit at this, but quickly are pulled back into your senses when a giant hand comes down and grabs you and Casey.

"Ryan, don't please!" You see Ethan running towards his departing hand. Ryan swings his other hand at Ethan, throwing him against the wall and knocking him out.

"Shut up, pest." Ryan then turned his attention towards you and Casey, droll beginning to accumulate at the corner of his mouth.

"Be brave." Casey whispered to you, but didn't sound too secure about it.

"Now...which one of you want to feed me first..." Ryan took his free hand and rested it on his bare stomach.
1221121111.title: Your older brother

12211211111.content:
You, rather stupidly, yell out to Ryan. "We're not scared of you!!!" Ryan chuckles at this. He tosses you into his free hand, while Casey remains in the other. Casey attempts to grab you, but fails. Ryan pushes you against his belly. You hear the inner workings of his digestive system, the gurgles and groans amplified due to his lean body and ravenous hunger.

"I guess you'll get to see my insides first beautiful." Ryan pulled you away from his stomach and brought you up to face level. Slowly, he pulled you closer to his gradually opening mouth.

"Noooo! Eat me, leave her alone, please!" Casey bellowed from below.

"Sod off." Ryan looked down at his next snack and grinned. He ignored Casey's violent thrashing as he tried to free himself. He turned his attention back to you, and continued the agonizing trip towards his mouth. You couldn't help it, you let out a soft sob.

"Wait a sec...AHHHHHHH!" You are flicked into Ryan's mouth, who begins to lightly chew on you, tasting you thoroughly.

"Don't worry, I don't like to chew on my food for too long." He laughed at his "joke" as he continued to toss you around his mouth, mmmmhmming occasionally. Inside the mouth all sense of orientation and direction was gone as you were tossed, turned, and jolted all over the environment.

"How could someone be so cruel..." You thought out loud. "I'm not a snack, I'm a human being dammit!" You leapt towards his closed jaws, and, in an effort of brute strength, began to pull them open. Ryan, annoyed, at you by now, was ready to swallow, before you lifted his jaw up and looked at Casey in Ryan's hand. "Don't worry Casey, I'll..." you are interrupted when Ryan's tongue wrapped around your body and pulled you into the back of his mouth.

"No..." Casey whimpered. Ryan, without hesitation, tilted his head as far back as possible and forced down a wet, exaggerated swallow. Casey, who was still locked in the palm of Ryan's hand, watched as Ryan's throat bulged out and took down what he knew was his sister. The bulge slicked down until it got to Ryan's chest, where he let out an exasperated, happy sigh. Casey, who was at stomach level, look at the toned belly of Ryan, which let out a joyous choir of gurgles, likely due to the presence of his sister.

"Damn your sis tasted good!" Ryan taunted. He licked his lips again, and clutching his belly, let out an exaggerated belch. "Don't worry Casey, plenty of room left for you." He laughed. His bare stomach rumbled again, and he patted it rather hard. "Hey settle down in there! You'll get some company soon enough." Casey looked at Ryan with a murderous glare.

"You're dead." '

Ryan simply laughed and walked over to his recliner. He plumped down on it and dropped Casey on his stomach. "Ready for your turn?"
12211211111.title: You

122112111112.content:
You scream as you slide down the length throat of Ryan. You come to a sudden halt when you land in his gurgling, disgusting stomach. You wipe some chime off of you and begin to move around in the darkness.

"Woah...how do I get out of here?" You run to the stomach lining and begin to pound with all your might. "Let me out!!! You asshole!" You are answered by a loud, violent burp that echoes in your chamber. Embarrassed, angered, and frightened, you decided that you needed to take action, or else you'll be digested.
122112111112.title: Your POV

choices: Continue to get out of the house
1221121111121.content:
You reach in your pocket and find some cherry bombs that you accidentally brought to school with you. "This is absurdly convenient." You mumble. You toss several at one of his stomach walls, which respond with a very loud grumble that shook the entire stomach chamber. "Wait, what did I just do..."

Outside of the stomach, Casey was being planted on some bread. Condiments lined that counter, and a big, hungry Ryan was looming over him wondered what he'd taste good with.

"This psycho is going to eat me..." Casey said to himself. " This is absolutely ridiculous. I can't believe she's gone...what will our parents wonder? They'll never know..."

"That's right!" Ryan was closely listening in on Casey's monologue. "They'll never think to check a college freshman's stomach! Of course, there won't be much left to check, but you get the drift." He laughed again but was cut short by another stomach gurgle. "That damn sister of yours is going to give me indigestion..." He rubbed it soothingly but it only got worse. "Shit..." Ryan suddenly dubbed over and began to expel vomit all over the kitchen floor. It was a continuous stream of mostly digested food, until something caused his neck to bulge out. The bulge went in reverse of what it should, towards his mouth. He spat out a large chunk of food that seemed humanoid.

"Jenna!" Casey shouted in excited disbelief. Half crazily, he rolled his sandwich bun several times towards the edge of the counter. He dropped off, the bun breaking his fall to the floor. He ran over to you, who was currently covered in vomit and mucus. "Are you alright sis?"

"Yeah, nothing years of therapy won't fix..."

Casey laughed, "well come on, let's get out of here before he recovers and chews us both to bits." You both begin to run towards an opening in some floor trimming when you suddenly stopped and looked at the passed out body of Ethan. "Come on there's nothing we can do for him right now, we've got to go!" The two of you keep running as you occasionally look back, hoping that Ryan will be alright.
1221121111121.title: Give him indigestion

choices: There's nothing you can do for her or yourself now
1221121111122.content: You're quickly losing oxygen. A shrill scream is heard, and you immediately see the slowly melting form of your sis.
1221121111122.title: You hear a screaming sound

You back away from him a little to get a good look, trying to figure out your new size. Comparing yourself to him, you think you might be 1/16 of an inch. The size of a small ant. The ride on the bus is bumpy as it constantly almost knocks you off your feet. Gazing up, you scream and jump, waving your arms.

" CODY! LOOK DOWN!! I'M RIGHT HERE!"

It was no use, but you know you have to gain his attention somehow.

" IF ONLY I CAN GET TO HIS EAR SOMEHOW, I KNOW HE'D HAVE TO HEAR ME THEN."

You look at the wall of fabric covering his crotch right in front of you. Walking up to it.

" I GUESS I'LL HAVE TO CLIMB."

You grab the fabric and begin your climb up. As you make it up to his zipper, your world shifts as Cody moves slightly. You hold on tightly to the loop of the zipper.

143.content:
Groggily, you stretch your arms and glance over to the opposite side of the room. Your cousin Tommy was there snoozing away the day, as the two of you had gone to sleep a little after three that morning. That's when the alarm starts to ring. Tommy mumbles in his sleep and you stumble over to turn it off. It's 11:00.

You decide to make a McDonald's run since Tommy will probably be hungry when he wakes up. You grab the keys and make the five minute drive to your local Mickey-D's. You order the chicken selects for you and a double quarter pounder for him. Although Tommy may be the same height and weight as you, he eats a lot more. You make sure to get the large fries and a large root beer to share.

Pulling into the driveway, you feel a bit queasy, but the feeling quickly passes. You make it to the front door when you realize that you forgot your house key. You knock on the door when suddenly...
143.title: Sleeping In

choices: Tommy answers the door and you are toddler-size  (3  feet)
Tommy answers the door and you are the size of a baby (1 1/2 feet)
Tommy answers the door and you are action-figure size (12 to 8 inches)
1431.content:
...your pants fell down to your knees

"What the--?" you gasped, scrambling to pull your pants up before the door was answered It was when you pulled your pants all the way up to your chest, did you realized that you were wearing VERY baggy clothes.

You absentmindedly let go of your pants to examine your hands and take in your surroundings. Everything was getting bigger and bigger as you slowly shrink down and finally stop when the door opened. You quickly covered your nakedness inside your overlarge shirt, making sure that only your head was visible.

You grab a hold of his flip-flop
1432.content: You're disillusioned for a few seconds. Then, you realize what just happened. Before you have a chance to figure out what to do next, the door opens and you see a humongous, shirtless Tommy. "He was getting ready to go to the pool," you think to yourself. Tommy looks confused at first, but then glances down to see the McDonald's bag. His face lights up instantly. "Thanks for lunch, Alec," he calls out. "Wherever you are." He smirks then reaches down to pick up the bag. You make a split-second decision.
1432.title: McDonald's Delivery

choices: You move out into the open where he can see you
14321.content:
Before he grabs the bag you jump into it through a small tear on the side. Nonchalantly, Tommy picks up the bag and brings it into the house. He sets it down on the kitchen table where he unloads the contents. "This is for me, and he probably got this for himself," Tommy says to no one in particular. "Ooooh... he even got root beer!" Upon realizing that you are the only thing left in the bag you quickly run out of the bag on to the surface of the kitchen table. Just as you anticipated, Tommy picks up the bag, balls it up, and tosses it into the trash can. He always did that to the bag. And this time, you could've been crushed up with it.

Not sure of what to do next, you hide behind the chicken selects box. He shouldn't touch those, after all, they are for you. As you gaze out from behind your hiding place, you can't help but gaze at your cousin in awe. Because the kitchen table was level with his waist, his whole torso was visible from where you were standing. He seemed to glistened in the noon heat and his abs rippled below his skin. Although his sixpack wasn't as defined as yours', you could tell he had taken to working out.

Suddenly, a rumble interrupted your daydream. He was hungry. And he was about to start eating.
14321.title: You climb into the McDonald's Bag

choices: You sneak around, contemplating your next course of action
143212.content:
Tommy opens the box and smiles in anticipation at his meal. He licks his lips, and brings the patty to his mouth. After the first bite, a little more than one-fourth of the original burger is missing. Tommy chews loudly, often moaning or smacking his lips in pleasure. Then comes the swallow--a large gulping noise. Four bites later, and the burger is gone. Tommy rubs his shirtless stomach, then belches. His abs, you notice, are not as visible.

Tommy starts on the fries. He shovels them in handfuls to his hungry maw, then quickly swallows them down with next to no chewing. He polishes off the box in three minutes flat. The root beer is next to go. It's gone in a matter of minutes. By now, Tommy's looks pretty satisfied, but his next words tell you otherwise. "Alec, I'm gonna eat your chicken selects next if you don't get your ass over here. I know you can hear me!"
143212.title: You remain hidden

1432121.title: Out in the open

14321211.content: Tommy begins to smile. That isn't a good thing, considering he hates bugs. "I could end your life with this very hand, bug." Tommy's stomach suddenly interjects. His smile widens. "Or I could make you a part of this awesome body." You realize that he means to eat you. Tommy glances up again and yells, "Alec I'm eating your chicken selects." He looks down to you. "With some extra protein." He sniggers at his joke. Tommy reaches down and pinches you between two of his fingers before you can react. He places you gently on a barbeque-sauce-covered chicken select. You're glued to the chicken strip by the sauce. He then lowers the chicken strip to his shirtless midsection, which gurgles loudly, working on the meal he just consumed and seeming to want much more. "Get used to your new home." A wave of vertigo overtakes you as Tommy raises the chicken select to his mouth. It waters in anticipation for its next meal... you included.
14321211.title: Bug!

143212112.content:
You wanted to yell out, but you had lost your voice at the moment due to the situation. All you could do was hope that he saw what you really were before he sent you down to his belly. Unfortunately for you, he licked you a couple of times giving you an answer.

Wow, you taste really good. You should be glad that I found you, I’m going to use you for a good purpose.” Tommy said, about to send you in. You couldn’t even struggle because of all of the sauce. Your ride started to move in as his mouth opened. You started to cry, you were out of his line of sight so you’re hope was gone. You stopped and looked up to see his teeth above you. You shut your eyes, you couldn’t bear to watch your fate.

Everything seemed to happen fast and was a blur to you. You remember suddenly feeling a lot of pain and being thrown around. Even though your eyes were closed, you could tell it was getting darker. You fell into some liquid and passed out.

“So tasty.” You remember hearing. You suddenly woke up, not feeling anything. You looked around until you saw Tommy who was still giant. He was done eating and set his hand on top of you. You flinched, freaked out only to have the hand pass right through you. Startled and confused, you looked at yourself closer to realize that you were see through. You jumped up and realized you could float and fly. Though this was kind of cool, you were sad when you realized what was going on.

You decided to follow Tommy after that. You followed him for years, simply watching the world go by. Tommy was sad that you had vanished, but you were even more depressed knowing what’s really happened to you. You stuck with your friend for the rest of his life, knowing that he would never find out what happened.
143212112.title: Fate has been sealed

choices: Your POV: You're chewed up into mush
Your POV: You manage to escape his chompers, only to be swallowed alive
1432122.content:
You're nervous about trying to get Tommy's attention. If he does see you, what will he think? He could easily mistake you or a bug and extinguish you with one swat of his giant hand. If he does recognise you, would he be responsible enough tto make sure you were safe until you got help? You feel guilty for thinking along those lines, but you have to be very careful here..

Suddenly, your choices are cut short. "Alright Alec, you don't want your chicken selects? Guess I may aswell enjoy 'em then!" Tommy reaches down with his big, clumsy hand and snatches up two of the crisp chicken pieces. The only problem is, he paws at them so greedily that you're snatched up with them, pinned between the hot, greasy food in Tommy's huge hand.

"Mmmm, these look good! I bet they'll taste even better knowing they're yours!" Tommy lifts the food up to his face and, over a hill of chicken, you can see an upshot of his mischevious eyes and his lips slowly parting as he pokes his tongue through and licks them in anticipation.

"No! Tommy, please! Look down here, I'm begging you!" It's too late to wave your arms - they're pinned tight between layers of hot food. Tommy calls out one last cheeky taunt, teasing you in a way that he's completely unaware of. "Here go your chicken selects, Alec! Say goodbye..!" You're headed towards the titan's gaping maw now. You can see saliva glistening on his red gums and tongue, and crumbs of food caught in the vague stubble below his lips.

He wraps those huge lips over his fingers as he shoves the greasy food inside his mouth, then chews long and hard to mince all of that delicious food into creamy mush before taking a big 'gulp' and licking his fingers. "Mmm-mm.." He says as the food travels to his stomach, which is now so bloated that his sculpted six-pack is nearly invisible. "That sure as good.. Sucks to be Alec"

The giant eating-machine pats his full stomach and lets out a long belch before relaxing back and waiting for his food to digest..
1432122.title: Food > Friends

14321221.content:
In Tommy's huge, cavernous mouth, you've given up screaming for health. Pieces of chewed chicken roll around you, you're covered in the hungry boy's slimey saliva and bits of mashed food as you dive left and right to avoid the gleaming white teeth smashing down and turning the food to mush.

With every flip of Tommy's huge tongue, you're thrown around with the food and have to jump out of the line of fire once again.

It's not until you're crawling in a chunky swamp of one hungry young man's chewed dinner that you finally start to lose your strength, and miss a beat.

You're rolled into the side of Tommy's mouth by his huge tongue, and all at once the huge teeth press down on the length of your leg and condense it to paste. You pull in the breath to scream just as Tommy's clean white molar's clamp down on your little body and mince you like a garbage truck compressing waste...

Outside, Tommy's Adam's apple bobs and he makes a nice loud belch, patting his belly.

"Thanks for the grub, Alec! It was delicious!"
14321221.title: Chewed up into mush

You somehow manage to slide underneath Tommy's huge warm tongue, becoming helplessly trapped underneath, as his huge teeth crush the chicken selects to a pulp. You now fear being sandwhiched to death between the bottom of Tommy's mouth and the underside of his giant tongue, if not drowning in his warm, sticky saliva. As Tommy swallows his delicious meal, his tongue rises, giving you a chance to escape. You try to climb from your under tongue pit, however as Tommy finishes swallowing the chicken, his huge tongue slams back down on top of you, trapping you in the tiny gap in between two of his ginormous white teeth. No matter how much you struggle, you are trapped.

Tommy decides to save the rest of the chicken selects, just in case you arrive for them.

Tommy feels you inbetween his teeth, and pushes you out of your trap with the end of his tongue, and grabs you inbetween his index finger and thumb. Tommy briefly takes you out of his mouth, relieving you slightly as you think you are safe. However, after briefly taking a glance at you on the end of his index finger, he assumes you are merely a tiny reminent of chicken left unswallowed. You scream in horror as Tommy opens his mouth, and once again you see his huge tongue approaching as he licks his giant finger, slamming you hard into his moist warm tongue. Once again you find yourself on Tommy's humungous tongue, panicking. Tommy does not hear your cries for help, as he rolls you around on his tongue, coating you in his thick, warm, sticky saliva.

Tommy's tongue then raises, causing you to slide helplessly down to the back of it, towards his throat. Covered in his saliva, you get one last look at the inside of Tommy's gigantic maw, as he effortlessly slides you off the back of his tongue and down his throat.


You are deposited in Tommy's giant cavernouss stomach, along with his recently swallowed food.

choices: Keira tries to get the giant man's attention
15.content:
Keira (http://stars.ign.com/dor/objects/1420881...) was a little weirded out by the bright light in the basement, so she made her way back up the steps. She felt oddly cold, so she decided to go outside where it was a nice summer day. As she made her way onto the carport, she felt a weird tingling sensation all through her body. All of a sudden, she was in the dark, and felt like a blanket was draped over her. And she was nude.

"What the hell?"

Keira tried frantically to get out from under the pile of what she assumed were blankets. When she finally emerged into the light, she looked around in disbelief. She had shrunk!

Keira ran back towards the front door of her house. She made it to the step, but could not begin to climb it, it was way too tall. By her estimates, she couldn't be more than two inches tall. And she was trapped on her own carport - there was no way she could adventure out into the grass.

Keira heard a car door shut. She hoped it was her mom, surely she could help her. It wasn't her mom, however, it was a man (http://www.dreamstime.com/royalty-free-s...) she'd never seen before. As the man walked up, he dropped a cigarette onto the ground and smashed it out only inches away from her. She dove out of the way of his giant foot. He knocked on the door, and waited a few seconds. She realized that getting his attention may be her only hope.
15.title: Keira (Girl)

choices: Hank takes the girl to his car
151.content:
Hank waited patiently but no one answered the door. He reached into his pocked and pulled out another Marlboro, lighting it and letting it dangle in his lips. Out of the corner of his eye he saw something moving, and looked down. The shrinking ray had been found.

---------

Keira looked up as the giant man turned from the door. He stopped to light a cigarette, and she realized now was her chance, maybe the man could help her. She started jumping an screaming as loud as she could, and he looked down at her. He kneeled down and reached his giant hand to grab her. She realized maybe this wasn't the best of ideas and turned to run, but it was too late.

--------

Hank reached down and wrapped his hand around the tiny girl. His fist completely enclosed her. He could feel her moving and chuckled to himself. He'd have to get the shrink ray another day, but for now, he had something just as valuable.
151.title: Keira tries to get the giant man's attention

choices: Hank breaks in to try to steal the shrinking machine
1511.content:
As Keira struggled in the giant hand, she felt it start to open. She now stood face to face with the giant man, his giant eyes examining her, his lit cigarette lazily dangling from his lips. She guessed she was only two inches tall, and the man, assuming he was six feet tall, would be like a giant over 200 ft tall. She watched as the cigarette rose up as his lips closed around it. His cheeks hollowed and the cherry glowed. His off hand removed it from his mouth as he inhaled the smoke. He smiled, pursed his lips, and then, before she knew it, a torrent of smoke rushed out of his lips and onto her tiny body.

---------

Hank opened his hand and looked at the tiny girl. She didn't move. He took a drag off of his Marlboro and blew the smoke on her to see if he could get a reaction. The tiny girl started coughing.

"Just wanted to be sure you were alive, tiny."

"Listen, Mister, just call my mom and she'll -"

"I can't very well do that little one. Then she'll know about the shrink ray. Well, and then I'd have to shrink her too. Now you wouldn't want that would you?"

----------

Keira listened to Hank's words. She definitely didn't want anyone else to have to be this tiny.

"So what're you gonna do with me?"

"Well, anything I feel I reckon. You're not quite in the position to argue."

----------

Hank looked as the helpless little girl shuddered at the ultimatum. He laughed a little, and then took another drag on his Marlboro, blowing more smoke on her tiny body.

"Get used to it, honey. I like smoking."
1511.title: Hank opens his hand

info.brief_description: Instead of growing like you should be, you shrink!
info.description: This is a basic shrinking story. You are an average teenager, shrunk by a mysterious machine in your basement. Now, you have to get back to being normal again while wandering through a world of giants. There is only one rule: the predator must always be male. If you fail to follow this rule, I will delete your chapter. Other than that, HAVE FUN!
